attributes.action: Urge Steve McLaren never to pick Frank Lampard for England again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The thought of Frank Lampard clogging up the England midfield for the next few years fills any right-thinking football fan with horror. We urge the Prime Minister to use the full force of his office to ensure this doesn't happen again. As Exhibits A, B,C, D & E I present his efforts in England's games in the 2006 World Cup. As Exhibit F, I present his truly godawful book "Totally Frank". As Exhibit G, I present the best England midfielder since Gascoigne, Paul Scholes, being forced to play on the left (and ultimately into retirement) to accomodate the footballing equivalent of lard.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
